projectName: Nuxt full-stack website using serverless functions
summary: Building a full-stack website to showcase and practice my web development skills. The website is created using the NUXT framework.
content:
Quick overview

Building a full-stack website to showcase and practice my web development skills. The website is created using the NUXT framework. Most of the programming is done in Vue and Js. The front-end is developed using Tailwind CSS. The website is hosted on Netlify, utilizing the company's serverless function option. The whole project is version-controlled using Git and GitHub.

The whole project is made from scratch. Developing the website gave me useful insights into how to utilize modules in NUXT and what a powerful framework it is.
